thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 7 of 171
thread.title: Heather Carthew

author: Heather Carthew
title: Heather Carthew
text: Only went to this site to find a house-sitter but ended up so convinced by their professional and secure website that we actually signed up to be house-sitters for other home owners. While it takes some time to set up profiles, both personal and for our pet, plus creating a "welcome" pack for potential sitters, the attention to detail and security requirements really impressed us. Our first house-sitter turned out to be an absolute gem. Just hope we can get some good sitting opportunities now we are signed up.
